Text: Watch out for this one people. Got an email from Comcast about copyright infringement for downloading this torrent. TTC seems to be on the watch for their shit all over the place. Just a heads up.

Also got one for these other two: 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6106526/The_Music_of_Richard_Wagner_-_TTC

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6085696/TTC_Audio_-_Holy_Land_Revealed

WARNING! 

A Notice of Claim of Copyright Infringement was sent to my ISP from TTC for this torrent. 
Don't let it happen to you... Use a proxy or download at your own risk!
